attributes.action: STOP IAN BRADY HAVING  ANY FURTHER APPEALS AT PUBLIC EXPENSE
attributes.additional_details:
Taxpayers should not have to pay legal costs to indulge this evil child killer's ego. His voice  must not be heard in public. What a waste of £250,000.

Members of the public are suffering the effects of austerity whilst this monster drains the public purse. The cost of his treatment and lodging in this top security hospital could be put to much better use. Though a death sentence would be too good for him, in  times of austerity we have all got to do our bit. Let Ian Brady do his. He wants to die, do you know anyone who wants him to live?
